includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: The new coach of the best high school football team in Texas battles with the pressures of the job and tries to get to know his charges.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The new coach of the best high school football team in Texas battles with the pressures of the job and tries to get to know his charges.

includedAssets.title: Eyes Wide Open
includedAssets.synopsis: Emotions run high as the team cope with recent tragic events. Meanwhile at the hospital, Lyla does her best to keep Street's hopes up.

includedAssets.title: Wind Sprints
includedAssets.synopsis: As the town begins to turn against Taylor, team morale slumps to an all-time low. Meanwhile, the reality of Street's injury hits home.
